column2: Nhabvu yePSL yodzoka
column3: Ndooka   ZVIKWATA zvose zvinokwikwidza muPremier Soccer League (PSL) zviri pakati pekunyoresa vatambi vazvo segadziriro yekudzoka kwemitambo yeCastle Premiership.   Mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa nemusi wa12 na13 Kukadzi zvichitevera kumiswa kwayakaitwa munaZvita gore radarika nekuda kwezororo reKirisimasi uye kupa mukana kuchikwata chenyika chemaWarriors kuti chigadzirire kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) kuCameroon uko chakadzoka mushure mekuburitswa mumutambo uyu.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL – Kudzai Bare – anoti mitambo yeCastle Premiership ichasimudzira masvondo anotevera.   “Hurongwa hwekudzoka kwemitambo yePSL huri kufamba mugwara uye kutaura kuno zvikwata zviri kunyoresa vatambi vazvo.   “Kana tapedza, mitambo inenge yave kusimudzira uye iri kutarisirwa kutanga musi wa12 na13 Kukadzi mazuva ayo atagara takazivisa kuti ndiwo mitambo iyi ichasimudzirwa,” anodaro Bare.   Zvisinei, mitambo iyi paichadzoka, mizhinji yacho inogona kukanganiswa nekunaya kuri kuita mvura uye izvi zvinotevera yambiro yakapihwa nebazi rinoona nezvemamiriro ekunze reMeteorogical Services Department (MSD) yekuti munyika muri kutarisirwa kunaya mvuya yakawanda kwenguva ndefu.   Bare anoti PSL ichabatana nemamwe masangano anoona nezvenhabvu mumazuva anotevera vachitenderera kunhandare dzakasiyana vachiongorora mamiriro akaita nhandare idzi.   “Nguva yatiri tinoziva kuti ndeyekunaya kwemvura saka mimwe mitambo inogona kukanganiswa nekudaro tichange tichiona mafambiro anenge achiita mitambo yacho.   “Zvagara hazvo kuti patichasimudzira nhabvu ndipo kubva kare paitanga mitambo yePSL asi kungoti apa chete tichangoti kurumidzei zvishoma. Asi mumazuva anotevera tichatenderera tichiongorora nhandare dzedu tichiona kuti dzakagadzirwa zvakadii uye dzinokwanisa here kutambirwa mitambo panguva ino yatiri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakadaro, pakamiswa mitambo yePSL munaZvita, zvikwata zvakawanda zvange zvatamba mitambo mitatu uye zvimwe miviri.   Izvi zvakaona chikwata cheManica Diamonds chichitungamira palogo zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mitambo yacho yose iri mitatu chiine zvibodzwa zvipfumbamwe.   Manica Diamonds iri kuteverwa neNgezi Platinum iyo, kubva pamitambo yayo mitatu, yakakwanisa kuhwina miviri ndokuita mangange mumwe chete uye ine zvibodzwa zvisere.   FC Platinum, iyo yakatora zvakare mukombe wePSL mwaka wadarika, ndiyo yakagara pechitatu iine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu izvo yakawana kubva mumitambo miviri.   Pechina pakagarwa neTriangle United iyo ine zvibodzwa zvitanhatu kubva mumitambo mitatu. Triangle yakahwina mitambo miviri ndokukundwa mumwe chete.   Kune rimwe divi, Bulawayo City ndiyo yakasenga iri pasi pelogo sezvo yangokwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwe chete kubva mumitambo mitatu yayatamba.   Chikwata ichi chakakundwa mumitambo miviri uye ndokuita mangange 3-3 neWhawha.

column2: Vagari Vaswera Vachizvifambira Zvavo muKwekwe Yakavharwa neMugovera
column3:
Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri. Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri.

Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakatara kuti lockdown iyi itange nezuro manheru, zvitoro nemamwe mabhizimisi zvange zvakavhurwa uye veruzhinji vange vachiita mabasa avo semazuva ose kusanganisira kutengesa pamisika nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa, vamwewo vari mumitsetse pamabhangi.

Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti muguta iri muchave nelockdown
kwemasvondo maviri kutanga nezuro manheru zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yechirwere cheCovid iyo yakauraya mumwe muzvinabhizmisi mudhorobha reRedcliff svondo rapera mushure mekunge ashanya kuIndia.

Vamwe vagari vemuKwekwe vataura neStuio 7 vati vanotyira kuti kungove
nelockdown munzvimbo iyi chete hakuna zvakunonyanyobatsira vamwewo
vachiti vanoona danho iri richibatsira.

Mumwe mugari, Parti Ngozo, anove mutapi wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ati maonero ake ndeekuti dai nyika yose yaiswa mulockdown sezvo mhando yechirwere cheCovid yekuIndia iyi ichiratidza kuti ine hukasha hwakasimba.

Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, Muzvare Nyarai Ndawana, avo vanove mukuru wesangano reZichea mudunhu reMidlands, vati veruzhinji vanonzwisisa chose kukosha kwekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 asi vati nekuda kwekutambura vakawanda vanozotadza kutevedzera zvimwe zvezvinodiwa vachitsvaga zvinoraramisa mhuri dzavo.

Meya weguta reKwekwe, Amai Angeline Kasipo, avo vanovewo
muzvinabhizimisi vane nzvimbo inoitirwa michato nezvimwe, vati
kunyange hazvo lockdown ichigona kuvhiringidza mararamiro evanhu, vane chokwadi chekuti veruzhinji vanonzwisisa kukosha kwedanho rekuve
nelockdown.

Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuKwekwe, VaFreddy Kapuya, avo vanove mumiriri weMhondoro Ngezi mudare paramende vari mubato reZanu PF, vati vanotambirawo danho rekuve nelockdown vachiti kukoshesa hutano hweveruzhinji ndicho chinhu chikuru.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vahigarawo muKwekwe, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati danho rekuti muKwekwe muve nelockdown rakanaka.  Asi Dr Madzorera vati danho iri rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nemamwe matanho akasimba anosanganisira kusimudzira ongororo yeveruzhinji kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Muchizivisa chavo nezuro, gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakatiwo mabhawa ose haasi kubvumidzwa kuvhura munguva yelockdown, uye michato nekunamata vanhu vakaungana, zvava kurambidzwawo kwemasvondo maviri.  VaChiwenga vakatiwo vanenge vafirwa vanofanirwa kunge vaine munhu abva kubazi rezvehutano, uye vanhu vanoungana parufu havafanirwe kudarika makumi matatu. Vanhu vanopfuura nemuguta reKwekwe vari kukurudzirwa zvikuru kusamira muguta iri kwenguva yakareba. VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichaenderera mberi nedzidziso yechirwere cheCovid-19, kucheneswa kwezvitoro nenzvimbo dzose dzinopindwa neveruzhinji.

Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende isimudzire kubaiwa kweveruzhinji nhomba senzira yekubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 9 369, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nezvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 624 665.

Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, avo vanove zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chauraya vanhu munyika yose vanosvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 1 586, uye kubata vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 664. Pasi rose, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu, 166 million, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru, 3, 460 000 vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. column2: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
column3: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

column2: Vabereki Vochema Chema neKumanikidzwa Kutenga Nhumbi dzeVana paChikoro Kuti Vawane Nzvimbo
column3: Vabereki vane vana vakawana nzvimbo dzeGrade One neForm One mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasi kufara nekumanikidzwa kutenga maUniforms pazvikoro kuti vapihwe nzvimbo. Vabereki ava vanoti kuti mwana apihwe nzvimbo anofanirwa kubhadhara mari yechikoro pamwe chete neyenhumbi dzechikoro idzo dzinotengeswa pachikoro pacho. Asi vabereki vanoti nhumbi dzechikoro dzinotengeswa pazvikoro dziri kudhura uye hadzina kusimba sezvakaita nhumbi dzechikoro dzinotengeswa kuzvitoro zvakaita seEnBee, Barbours kana Adams. Chiri kunyanya kurwadza vabereki ndechekuti kana munhu asina kubhadhara mari yenhumbi dzechikoro mwana wake anoshaya nzvimbo yechikoro. Mumwe mubereki VaJustin Nyachowe vanoti zvikoro zviri kubira vanhu mari sezvo vari kusanganisa kuwana nzvimbo dzechikoro nekutenga nhumbi dzechikoro dzevana. Mumwe mubereki muzvare Georgina Komoto vane mwana akawana nzvimbo pachikoro cheNemakonde vanoti nhumbi dzinotengeswa kuchikoro hadzina kusimba asi dzinodhura . Muzvare Kamoto vanoti zviri pachena kuti muzvikoro mave kuitwa zvehuori. Asi vamwe vabereki vanoti danho rekutenga nhumbi dzechikoro dzinogadzirwa nekambani imwechete rakanaka sezvo nhumbi dzacho dziine ruvara rwakafanana. VaChristopher Chaita mumwe wevabereki vane maonero akadaro. Mukuru webazi rezvedzidzo mudunhu reMashonaland West VaSylvester Mashayamombe vanoti hausi mutemo wehurumende kuti zvikoro zvitengesere vabereki nhumbi dzevana vechikoro. VaMashayamombe vanoti kutengeswa kwenhumbi dzevana muzvikoro kunofanirwa kurerutsira vabereki kwete kuvaomesera. VaMashayamombe vanoti mutemo wehurumende haumanikidzire mwana kuti apfeke nhumbi dzechikoro kuti adzidze. Pane runyerekupe rwekuti makambani evakuru vakuru vemuhurumende ndiwo ari kusona nhumbi dzevana vechikoro idzo vabereki vari kuti dziri kudhura uye dzisina kusimba. Zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa musi wa 10 Ndira. No media source currently available

column2: Zim yotamba nePakistan
column3: Chikwata chenyika checricket chemaChevrons chakatanga gadziriro dzekusangana nePakistan izvo zvichaona zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichitamba mitambo miviri yeTest match series nemitatu yeTwenty20 International Series (T20I).   Mukushi wemashoko kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) — Darlington Majonga — anoti maChevrons achatamba nePakistan musi wa17 Kubvumbi na21 Kubvumbi mutambo weT20I.   Zvikwata izvi zvichazotatsurana zvekare musi wa23 na25 Kubvumbi.   Kana mitambo yeT20I yapera, zvikwata zviviri izvi zvichabandana mumitambo yetest match series apo mutambo wekutanga uriko musi wa29 Kubvumbi uchizopera musi wa3 Chivabvu kozoti wechipiri uchatanga musi wa7 Chivabvu uchipera musi wa11 Chivabvu.   “Pakistan iri kutarisirwa munyika musi wa17 Kubvumbi apo ichauya kuzosangana neZimbabwe mumitambo miviri yetest match nemitatu yeTwenty20 International games,” anodaro Majonga. Mitambo yezvikwata zviviri izvi yose ichatambirwa paHarare Sports Club munhandare isina vatsigiri senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Majonga anoti mitemo yemunyika muno neWorld Health Organization (WHO) yekudzivirira Covid-19 ichitevedzwa pamitambo iyi.   “Mitambo iyi ichitambirwa pasi pechirongwa chebio-secure bubble zvinoreva kuti vatambi, varairidzi nevose vari kuona nezvemitambo iyi vachagara kure neveruzhinji uye hapana vatsigiri vachatenderwa kusvika pedyo navo.   “Apo mitambo inenge ichitambwa, vatambi vose vachange vachivhenekwa kuti havana here kubatira denda reCovid-19, koti mazuva ose nhandare dzichafafaidzwa kuitira kuuraya hutachiona,” anodaro Majonga.   Mutambo wemaChevrons nePakistan uyu unotevera mumwe wechikwata chenyika ichi neAfghanistan uyo wakatambirwa kuUnited Arab Emirates nguva yadarika.

column2: VaJoram Gumbo Vopomerwa Mhosva yeHuori-ZACC Ichiti Haisati Yasumwa
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti kambani yavo yekusona hembe inonzi JMCD yakapihwa basa nekambani yeZinara uye vachinzi vaitorawo mari kubva kukambani iyi yaive pasi pebazi ravo. Asi vachibvunzwa nebepanhau reHerald, VaGumbo vakaramba kuti vanoita zvehuori vachiti kambani yavo inotengeserawo mbatya kuZanu-PF mauto nemamwe mapazi ehurumende. VaGumbo vanonzi vaipihwawo mari kubva kuZINARA dzekuenda kuMalaysia kunoita basa reAir Zimbabwe risinei nekugadzira migwagwa sezvinoshandiswa homwe iyi. Komishina weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaGoodson Nguni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi nekudaro hapana chavangataure parizvino. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira MDC kuKambuzuma VaWillas Madzimure vanove nhengo yeAfrican Parliamentarians Network Against Corruption uye vari mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandiro emapazi ehurumende avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti makurukota nenhengo dzedare reparamende vabude pachena panyaya yehupfumi hwavo vachangotora mhiko.
